pullRequest.title: [service bus] Migration guide changes for errors, api changes, etc...
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixing some small stuff in the migration guide:

processor error handler has a different signature, need to use the session builder, etc..
some syntax errors (variable called client, usage uses 'sender')
inconsistencies in some samples if they're pasted as is

commit.message: Updating migration guide to incorporate changes made in the API along with a few small errors and consistency changes
Remove manual message compleition - the processor autocompletes by default and we haven't shut it off.

nodes.bodyText:
Our samples use this variable connectionString thats why you saw it here.
I think we can follow what we do for ReadMe https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/blob/master/sdk/servicebus/azure-messaging-servicebus/src/samples/java/com/azure/messaging/servicebus/ReadmeSamples.java#L41
.connectionString("<< CONNECTION STRING FOR THE SERVICE BUS NAMESPACE >>")
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -166,9 +168,11 @@ We continue to support sending bytes in the message. Though, if you are working
 message directly without having to convert it to bytes first. The snippet below demonstrates the sync sender client.
 
 ```java
+// code using the latest package.
+
 // create the sync sender via the builder and its sub-builder
-ServiceBusSenderClient client = new ServiceBusClientBuilder()
-    .connectionString(connectionString)
